issue.title: Gazebo crash when running long time in ubuntu in vmware

content.raw:
This seems like a question that would fit better on http://answers.gazebosim.org/questions/ . There you will find more people who may have run into the issue before and can help you troubleshoot.

Gazebo 2.x is EOL, and it doesn't receive bug fixes anymore. It would be good to upgrade to gazebo 9.x when you can.
content.html:
